name: Incanto
description: A fully responsive e-commerce website featuring a shopping cart with product management. It includes a mock Paystack payment integration for a real-world feel. Users can browse products, add them to their cart, and go through a smooth checkout process.

name: Modiba Solutions
description: I worked on the frontend of a service-based business website using React and Next.js. I turned the Figma designs into responsive, clean pages and made sure everything looked good on all devices. I also worked with a backend engineer to connect things like the contact form and dynamic sections to the API. The goal was to keep the site fast, user-friendly, and easy to navigate.
